title: Learner-Centered Continuous Professional Development Program for Engineering Experts in High-Risk Industries

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Emphasis on field-intensive learning activities using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real-world cases from high-risk industrial settings and apply a safety decision-making framework.
Learners can derive context-specific safety improvement plans through collaborative problem-solving with peer experts.
Learners can build a field-based learning portfolio using digital tools and develop self-directed learning plans.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
